english: Lingnan region; south of the mountain ridges; south of the Five Ridges; Guangdong–Guangxi region

etymology.description: 岭(嶺) ‘ridge’ + 南 ‘south’ = region south of the ridges (Lingnan).
etymology.interpretation: Literally ‘south of the ridges’, a toponym for the area south of the Five Ridges (Nanling system), conventionally the Guangdong–Guangxi region. Often extended historically to broader southern territories beyond the mountain passes.
etymology.simplification: 嶺 → 岭 by simplifying the phonetic component 領 to 令 while keeping the mountain radical, reducing strokes for easier writing.

examples.chinese: 岭南位于五岭以南(嶺南位於五嶺以南)。
examples.english: Lingnan lies south of the Five Ridges.

examples.chinese: 岭南气候温暖湿润(嶺南氣候溫暖濕潤)，物产丰富(物產豐富)。
examples.pinyin: Lǐngnán qìhòu wēnnuǎn shīrùn, wùchǎn fēngfù.
examples.english: The Lingnan region has a warm, humid climate and abundant products.

examples.chinese: 广州是岭南文化的中心城市之一(廣州是嶺南文化的中心城市之一)。
examples.pinyin: Guǎngzhōu shì Lǐngnán wénhuà de zhōngxīn chéngshì zhī yī.
examples.english: Guangzhou is one of the core cities of Lingnan culture.
